name: puppylogger
description: A simple, mobile-friendly web app to track your new puppy's activities — naps, feedings, playtime, pee, and poop — with one-tap logging.

scripts.minify:html: npx html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-js true --minify-css true dist/index.html -o dist/index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run copy:static && npm run minify:html && npm run minify:js
